question.title: Number of Trusted Contacts of a Customer
question.translatedTitle: 顾客的可信联系人数量

mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists Customers (customer_id int, customer_name varchar(20), email varchar(30))
Create table If Not Exists Contacts (user_id int, contact_name varchar(20), contact_email varchar(30))
Create table If Not Exists Invoices (invoice_id int, price int, user_id int)
Truncate table Customers
